thread.section_title: Melia Vendome - Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Very convenient
thread.title_full: Very convenient - Review of Melia Vendome - Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MBB50
title: Very convenient
text: This hotel was great for its location and size of room. A few blocks away from the Louvre one way and the Sienne in the other direction. The room was comfortable with a large size bathroom for Europe. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The breakfast included was a hot or cold breakfast and a great way to start day. Only drawback is the noise in hallway and doors shutting at night. Otherwise a great hotel. There was a very nice fish cafe down the street that was excellent
